scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file resources/infrastructure.yaml --stack-name demo-alb-asg --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile aws-labs-admin
scripts.get-load-balancer-url: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name demo-alb-asg --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`LoadBalancerURL`].OutputValue' --output text --profile aws-labs
scripts.status: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name demo-alb-asg --query 'Stacks[0].StackStatus' --output text --profile aws-labs
